backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing detected feature changes, associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet assets and mounting the app root with the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying theme support and rendering the earthquake dashboard.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Displays three summary cards showing total events, above-threshold count, and the largest earthquake.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Dialog rendering detailed earthquake information, including moment tensor data when available.
Leaflet-based map that renders and filters earthquake markers by bounds, supporting optional constrained height.
Displays a virtualized, scrollable table of earthquake results with selection, moment-tensor detection, and action controls.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides UI controls for time window, magnitude, search filtering, and data refresh actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that USGS data is fetched client‑side elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches USGS earthquake feed data with React Query and auto‑refreshes at set intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEventDetail.ts: Fetches and caches detailed USGS event information when a detail URL is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useVirtualWindow.ts: Implements lightweight virtualization logic to compute visible list indices based on scroll position.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark seismic-themed color variables, and Leaflet z-index adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Provides filtering and sorting utilities for earthquakes based on time window, magnitude, and search text.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeMapBounds.ts: Filters earthquakes to those within (or near) given map bounds with date-line handling.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes total count, count above a magnitude threshold, and finds the largest-magnitude feature from a list.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Fetches a URL and returns parsed JSON, throwing an error on non-OK responses.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides formatting helpers for timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines Leaflet-related TypeScript types and utilities, including a marker factory using magnitude-based styling.
frontend/src/lib/mmi.ts: Implements MMI formatting utilities converting numeric values to Roman numerals and descriptive labels.
frontend/src/lib/usgsEventDetailTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for detailed USGS earthquake event responses, including moment tensor products.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Provides USGS feed URLs and helpers for labeling and coloring magnitudes.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Defines core USGS GeoJSON feature and response types plus filter-related interfaces.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Implements the main dashboard with filtering, view modes, stats, and earthquake detail interactions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, plugins, colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, issues, and feature requirements for UI border clipping fixes.
